{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = <!-- Image filename --> |image1_size = <!-- Image size, ex.150px --> |caption = AmpliFi HD (High Density) Mesh Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.amplifi.com/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Ubiquiti Networks |model = AFi |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -R |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1750 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, mesh node |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = SWX-AFR |icid = 6545A-AFR |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9563; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = MIPS 74Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 750 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L25635FMI-10G; |flash1size = 32 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Winbond;W971GG6SB-25; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Atheros;AR8327N;AR8327N-BL1A; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = <!-- 10MbE,100MbE,1GbE, --> |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = B4:FB:E4 |oui = B4:FB:E4
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = Linux;4.1.6;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = <!-- VDC,VAC, or POE, --> |pwr_vdc = 9 |pwr_amp_dc = 1.7 |pwr_conn = USB Type C
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.0+EDR, |addchip = 120MHz 32-bit ARM Cortex-M3 MCU;STMicroelectronics;STM32F205;;1; ,,, Bluetooth Chip;Atheros;AR3012;AR3012-BL3D, FK5451LL, 1545 TW;1; ,,, 2.4GHz RF Front-End Module;RFMD (ANADIGICS);AWL9271;9271, 44009, AC PH, 1626;3; ,,, 5GHz RF Front-End Module;RFMD (ANADIGICS);AWL9571;9571, 44099, AC PH, 1636;3;,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL850G;;1;,,, 3A, 5V, 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down DC/DC Converter;M3Tek;MT3058;;1;,,, 3A, 4.5-27V Simple Buck Regulator;Alpha & Omega (Α&Ω);AOZ1212;;1;,,, 8-Bit Flash Microcontroller w/Embedded ICE and ISP;SONiX;SN8F26E611L;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = PloTech |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/20/2016 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = 810354026089 |ean = 0810354026096 |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = 9SIAA7W8WD4010 |asin = B07RQMV2Z8 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = B01L9O07FS |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin3 = B01L9O08PW |asin_country3 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 3 |rad1rxchains = 3 |rad1sstreams = 3 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 450 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9880-BR4A;QCA9880-BR4A; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 3 |rad2rxchains = 3 |rad2sstreams = 3 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1300 |rad2n = 450 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== For use with the [[Ubiquiti Networks AmpliFi HD MeshPoint (AFi-P-HD)|AmpliFi HD MeshPoint]]
Consists of 4 boards: * Board containing antenna silkscreened with ''UHL ANTENNA BOARD'' * Board containing SOC, WiFi Radio, Bluetooth Radio, Flash and Memory silkscreened with ''WIFI ROUTER HD'' * Board containing Switch, USB Hub and Microcontroller silkscreened with ''AMPLIFI_ROUTER_BOT_TYPE_C'' * Board containing ARM Cortex-M3 attached to LCD Display
==Links of Interest== [https://amplifi.com/docs/AmpliFi_Datasheet.pdf AmpliFi Datasheet]
===Reviews=== * [https://arstechnica.com/gadgets/2016/07/spending-some-time-with-ubiquiti-labs-amplifi-home-wi-fi-mesh-system/ Review on '''ArsTechnica'''] * [http://www.mbreviews.com/ubiquiti-amplifi-hd-review/ Review on '''MBReviews'''] * [http://koolshare.cn/thread-90317-1-1.html Review on '''KoolShare'''] ([http://koolshare.cn/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=90317&aid=143520&from=album&page=1 PCB images]) :[https://wk.baidu.com/view/84b0e2cf6bd97f192379e98b?pcf=2&re=view ''ANADIGICS'' WiFi Products (FEM)]
==See also== *[[Ubiquiti Networks AmpliFi Router (AFi-R)]] - :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/SWX-AFR SWX-AFR] • IC ID: 6545A-AFR *[[Ubiquiti Networks AmpliFi MeshPoint (AFi-P)]] - :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/SWX-AFP SWX-AFP] • IC ID: 6545A-AFP *[[Ubiquiti Networks AmpliFi HD MeshPoint (AFi-P-HD)]] - :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/SWX-AFPHD SWX-AFPHD] • IC ID: 6545A-AFPHD
